blockers.description: Python/Rust generators don't handle IRPatternMatch nodes
blockers.details: stdlib function bodies use pattern matching syntax (if x is Some(val):) which parses to IRPatternMatch. Python generator doesn't handle this node type, generates invalid code like 'Option.None' and '<unknown: IRPatternMatch>'. Need to implement pattern match codegen in python_generator_v2.py and rust_generator_v2.py.
blockers.workaround: Integrate stdlib with MCP server (bypasses pattern matching, enables multi-language)
blockers.impact: Codegen test fails, stdlib functions can't execute, runtime blocked
blockers.resolution: Add gen_pattern_match() method to generators, handle IRPatternMatch in gen_stmt()
